To greatly protect one's own body.

one can obtain the joy and gaze of Bodhisattva Sūryavairocana.

analyzed: 印誦前甘露軍茶利大明。

Straighten the two index fingers,
Place them on the back of the middle fingers,

After the sages are settled,

Use the thumb of the right hand
To pinch the tip of the index fingernail.

With both hands facing each other,

When forming this mudrā,

With the two hands placed together,
